scripts.cy:stag:chrome: cypress run --config baseUrl=http://devtodo.monfared.io/ --spec cypress/e2e/features/*.feature --browser chrome --record --group chrome
scripts.cy:stag:firefox: cypress run --config baseUrl=http://stagtodo.monfared.io/ --spec cypress/e2e/features/*.feature --browser firefox --record --group firefox
scripts.cy:stag:parallel: npm run cy:stag:parallel:chrome & npm run cy:stag:parallel:firefox
scripts.cy:stag:parallel:chrome: cypress run --config baseUrl=http://devtodo.monfared.io/ --spec cypress/e2e/features/*.feature --browser chrome --record --group chrome --parallel
scripts.cy:stag:parallel:firefox: cypress run --config baseUrl=http://stagtodo.monfared.io/ --spec cypress/e2e/features/*.feature --browser firefox --record --group firefox --parallel
